landing.title: AI Mock Interview
landing.subtitle: Interview Practice
landing.heroDesc: Five AI-tailored questions for your role. Speak your answers naturally. Get feedback that helps you improve.
landing.feature1Desc: AI analyzes your role, tech stack, and experience level to generate five relevant interview questions.
landing.feature2Desc: Use your microphone and webcam to practice just like a real interview. We never save your recordings.
landing.feature3Desc: Each answer is rated and compared to an ideal response, with specific suggestions to strengthen your delivery.

dashboard.title: Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Create and practice AI-powered mock interviews

create.title: Create a new interview
create.description: Choose how you'd like to generate your interview questions.
create.formDescAuto: Add details about the job position, description, and experience.
create.formDescContent: Provide the job position and paste any reference material (resume, job posting, notes, etc.).
create.dropPdf: Drop your PDF here or click to browse
create.pasteReference: Paste your resume, job posting, study notes, or any content you want questions generated from...
create.resumeDesc: Upload a PDF or paste your resume text so AI can personalize questions to your experience. This step is optional.
create.pasteResume: Paste your resume text here for personalized questions...
create.aiProbe: AI will probe your specific experience and skills

setup.title: Let's Get Started
setup.subtitle: Review the details below and start your mock interview when ready
setup.speakNaturally: Speak naturally — AI captures your responses
setup.previewText: Hello! I'll be your interviewer today. Let's get started.

interview.recordPlaceholder: Start recording to see your answer here...

feedback.title: Interview Complete
feedback.subtitle: Here's how you did — review each answer below
